section.title:
bills of materials without component item sites
bills of materials invalid Bills of Materials Without Component Item Sites
section.para: The "Bills of Materials Without Component Item Sites" utility enables you to generate a list of parent Items whose Bills of Materials do not have component Item Sites. The display also provides other valuable information about each Item. Selecting the "The Bills of Materials Without Component Item Sites" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Bills of Materials Without Component Item Sites

note.para: This utility may run for a long period of time. We recommend running it during off-peak hours whenever possible.

section.para: When using this utility, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Bills of Materials without component Item Sites from all Sites.
Specify Site whose Bills of Materials without component Items Sites you want to display.

varlistentry.term: Update when Items or Item Sites are Changed

listitem.para: Select to update the display when changes are made to Items or Item Sites.
Display lists invalid Bill of Materials Items sorted according to the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to identify Bills of Materials without component Item Sites, using the specified parameters.
